text: small request: could we buy half and half in smaller containers? easier to pour
unfortunately, costco only has the one size. I would have to split my order between whole foods and costco which means more expensive but I will see what I can do. no promises.

attachments.title: Fix sexism in air conditioning, save the planet
attachments.text: Well, not quite, but buildings are too cold because they're optimised for men.
attachments.fallback: Ars Technica: Fix sexism in air conditioning, save the planet

text: tl;dr: people with different metabolic rates (whether because of body type, activity level, diet, alien probes, etc) experience temperature differently. Not exactly mind-blowing, but there it is.
<@U02F8LF2X>: what if I bring in a smaller bottle that you can pour the half and half into????
